articles.title: US Warns India Of "Consequences" Over Avoiding Sanctions On Russia - NDTV
articles.description: US cautioned of "consequences" for countries attempting to "circumvent" American sanctions against Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine and said it would not like to see a "rapid" acceleration in India's import of energy from Russia.
articles.content:
US said it would not like to see a "rapid" acceleration in India's import of energy from Russia

articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.title: Here's how China's latest Covid lockdowns have affected American businesses in the country - CNBC
articles.description: China's worst Covid wave in two years has cut into revenue projections for roughly half of American businesses in the country, a survey showed Friday.
articles.content:
BEIJING China's worst Covid wave since the initial shock of the pandemic has cut into annual revenue projections for roughly half of American businesses in the country, a survey showed Friday.

articles.title: Record-Setting NASA Astronaut and Two Cosmonauts Return From International Space Station - SciTechDaily
articles.description: After extending the record for the longest single spaceflight in history by an American to 355 days, NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei returned to Earth on Wednesday, March 30, 2022, along with Roscosmos cosmonauts Anton Shkaplerov and Pyotr Dubrov. The trio depa…
